SELECT C.CMMT_ID , TO_CHAR(C.CMMT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') CMMT_DATE , TO_CHAR(C.CMMT_TIME, 'HH24:MI:SS') CMMT_TIME , TO_CHAR(C.FNSH_TIME, 'HH24:MI:SS') FNSH_TIME , E.EMP_NAME , C.EMP_ID , C.DEL_YN FROM COMMUTE C JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON C.EMP_ID = E.EMP_ID
WHERE TO_CHAR(C.CMMT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
WHERE E.EMP_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
WHERE C.EMP_ID LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
ORDER BY CMMT_DATE DESC

SELECT C.CMMT_ID , TO_CHAR(C.CMMT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') CMMT_DATE , TO_CHAR(C.CMMT_TIME, 'HH24:MI:SS') CMMT_TIME , TO_CHAR(C.FNSH_TIME, 'HH24:MI:SS') FNSH_TIME , E.EMP_NAME , C.EMP_ID , C.DEL_YN FROM COMMUTE C JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON C.EMP_ID = E.EMP_ID WHERE E.EMP_ID = #{empId} ORDER BY CMMT_DATE DESC
